messages.subject: Re: Attitude and consequences
messages.msgSnippet: ... When you say consequences, you re not talking about natural consequences (she kicks wall, foot hurts), you re talking about punishment, so you might just
messages.messageBody:
----------
>From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2502
>Date: Fri, Oct 18, 2002, 2:53 PM
>

> The only solution I see, is consequences.

When you say consequences, you're not talking about natural consequences
(she kicks wall, foot hurts), you're talking about punishment, so you might
just call it that.

Several people offered you a variety of other solutions. I'm sorry you've
disregarded and dismissed all of them. This is probably not the right list
to find out how best to punish your 9 year old.

I could be wrong about that, but I sure hope not.

Pam
